original:
The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence (SETI) and Communication with Extraterrestrial Intelligence (CETI) are fields dedicated to the exploration of signals from intelligent extraterrestrial civilizations. SETI primarily focuses on the detection of signals using radio and optical telescopes, while CETI emphasizes the composition and interpretation of messages that could be comprehensible to other technological civilizations.

Huma
sampled:
The Search for Extraterrestrial Sentience (SETI) and Communication with Extraterrestrial Intellect (CETI) are fields dedicated to the exploration of signals from intelligent extraterrestrial civilizations. SETI primarily focuses in the detection of signals using radio and optical telescopes, while CETI emphasizes the composition and interpretation in messages that could be comprehensible to other technological civilizations.

Huma
